name: Paolo's Pizza Panic
description:
Story

You play as Paolo, a nice italian dude who is just trying to make his customers happy in this pandemic. Grab a package from one of your 3 restaurants that are scattered around the city (yes, you gotta find them yourself, great way to explore) and bring all the pizzas to their customers as fast as you can.

You can retry a quest as often as you like, so please leave a comment with proof of your best time and see if you can beat our dev times ;)

Team
  • Andreas Tscheinig 
  • Christoph Wedenig

Special thanks to kenney.nl for the awesome free assets that were used to create the whole city!

Controls ControlUsageA, D / Arrow left, rightSteering left / right
WAccelerate forwardsD Accelerate backwardsXBrakeRReset car (if stuck)CSwitch between cameras

Source code: https://github.com/swagslash/PaolosPizzaPanic

Dev times:

Quest 1:  00:53:09 (if you beat that, props)
